alert.note: Alert for Mainland Northern Brevard; Northern Brevard Barrier Islands; Southern Brevard Barrier Islands (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 24 at 7:31PM EDT by NWS Melbourne
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Brevard County through 815 PM EDT... At 730 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Playalinda Beach, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Titusville, Cocoa Beach, Cape Canaveral, Titusville Airport and Port Canaveral. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Mainland Northern Brevard; Northern Brevard Barrier Islands; Southern Brevard Barrier Islands
